post.body: & you better look behind u, my dogs @ChiliconQueso are #108 in TwitPower w/ no opposable thumbs! http://TwitPWR.com/ZG/
after that tweet, you have no idea of how grateful i am that you are on the other side of the building
TY! I still have a late Christmas gift to give to you. Lunch soon
thank you my artist friend!
thanks! Painting makes me very happy no matter what emotion I start with and even more blessed when someone loves it.
to stay on your follow list! Thanks for Birthday wish!
Thank you, and remember the white zone is for loading & unloading only.
looks like I picked a bad day to quit sniffing glue
do you like to watch gladiator movies?
stop calling me Shirley
I want in.Then u'll always know how cool u r, how someone has nearly as great hair & 2 never let u forget u wore silly pantalones ha
PS that was early-for-Monday birthday wish
I never knew we shared the same birthday! I got goosebumps to learn I am in such amazing company. What a blessing! HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
Great new pic! Did u see dog's New Year's Party outfits? http://twitter.com/chiliconqueso I'm forever a kid, dontcha love it!
You follow so I can DM? thanks!
I SHOULD but I'm still in denial. Uh Oh, a SURE sign.& it's not normal to Tweet fr bed on iphone if can't sleep?... Signing up
Thank you everyone for so many great birthday wishes! You made my day!
Ok it's officially my birthday right down to the minute. Maybe why im awake? Y'all exceptionally entertaining, but now can I get some sleep?
The first person I followed on Twitter was @patobryan. http://tinyurl.com/9cflat #firstfollow
"Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all. Security is mostly a superstition, it does not exist in nature." Helen Keller
